}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Check Point L-50WD - 8 Port Gigabit Firewall Appliance :CPAP-SG1140-NGTP-W-ADSL-A-FCCA :CPAP-SG640-NGTP-W-ADSL-A-FCCA
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88F6281 ARM v5 (@1.2GHz) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 512MB NAND Flash, SD Card Slot *WiFi: [[Atheros]] AR9287 (802.11bgn) *Network: 12x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.cpug.org/forums/showthread.php/18672-Check-Point-1100-Appliance-FAQ User Group FAQ]
